Package com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.shared_services

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBasicSearchService<O>
    Provides very basic Lucene-type search services - querying, filtering, and faceting
    ICrudService<O>
    A generic interface to an "object" datastore with a "MongoDB like" interface
    ICrudService.IBatchSubservice<O>
    A more efficiently batch interface that may or may not be implemented - version supporting deduplication on insert
    ICrudService.IMetaModel
    A table-level interface to the CRUD store using the open MetaModel library Can be retrieved using ICrudService.getUnderlyingPlatformDriver(IMetaModel.class, Optional.empty()
    ICrudService.IReadOnlyCrudService<O>  
    IDataServiceProvider
    Provides an optional generic data service interface
    IDataServiceProvider.IGenericDataService
    A collection of method calls that represents a generic data service in Aleph2 Not all of the methods make sense for all data services - the optional is used to indicate whether a particular method can be invoked (for a particular bucket)
    IDataWriteService<O>
    A write only object store - no concept of deduplication, querying, updates etc - then is extended by ICrudService to provide the full functionality
    IDataWriteService.IBatchSubservice<O>
    A more efficient batch interface that may or may not be implemented
    IExtraDependencyLoader
    A interface "contract" that indicates that the service developer wishes the framework to use the top level dependency injection framework to load some "internal" classes.
    IManagementCrudService<O>
    Override of the CRUD service that provides a side channel with additional management information in its future
    IManagementCrudService.IReadOnlyManagementCrudService<O>  
    ISecurityService
    Handles permissions for the system.
    IServiceContext
    Helper class to give access to all the configured services available in the application.
    ISubject  
    IUnderlyingService
    A service that enables the underlying artefacts to be exposed
    IUuidService
    A service for generating different UUID strings
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ICrudService.Cursor<O>  
    IPersistentService
    This interface can be implementred to provide a permanent actor presence for any service registered with ModuleUtils
    MockManagementCrudService<T>
    Mock implementation of management CRUD (and therefore normal CRUD) for use in unit testing NOTE: not a functional database
    MockSecurityService
    A useful mock object for unit testing.
    MockSecurityService.MockSubject
    Mock security subject
    MockServiceContext
    A useful mock object for unit testing, enables devs to create their own IServiceContexts without using guice
